communications.subject: Michigan Freedom of Information Act Request: Mary Kathryn (May) Sherrer Incarceration
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Michigan Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All information regarding the arrest and incarceration of Mary Kathryn Sherrer (birthdate March 22, 1946) in 1984 in Midland County Jail, specifically in August of that year, but likely other months as well. 

A few notes to assist with searching: 
- Her full name is "Mary Kathryn," but she typically went by Kathy.
- I believe her name at the time of incarceration was Sherrer, but previous last names include Blake and May. She may have been booked under any of these last names.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Katie King

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: Mary Kathryn (May) Sherrer Incarceration
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All information regarding the incarceration of Mary Kathryn Sherrer (birthdate March 22, 1946) in 1984 in Midland County Jail, specifically in August of that year, but likely other months as well. 

A few notes to assist with searching: 
- Her full name is "Mary Kathryn," but she typically went by Kathy.
- I believe her name at the time of incarceration was Sherrer, but previous last names include Blake and May. She may have been booked under any of these last names.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Katie King

communications.subject: RE: Texas Public Information Act Request: Mary Kathryn (May) Sherrer Incarceration
communications.communication:
We are not showing ever having had an inmate with any of those names in our custody.
Regards,
Texas Department of Criminal Justice - PIA
Open Records Coordinator
Executive Services
